description: Java entity class for a To-Do item in a to-do list management system, including fields for id, title, description, status, due date, and timestamps, with JPA annotations for persistence and indexing.

classes.name: ToDo
classes.description: Entity class representing a single to-do item with attributes like id, title, description, status, due date, and timestamps, mapped to a database table.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Getter for the last updated timestamp.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Setter for the last updated timestamp.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Callback method annotated with @PreUpdate to update 'updatedAt' timestamp before database update.
